snippet: The commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration, Dr. Margaret A. Hamburg, discusses its proposed rule that would cover e-cigarettes.
abstract: Letter from Margaret A Hamburg, Food and Drug Administration Commissioner, responds to May 4 article on study finding that some high-power e-cigarettes produce carcinogens.
lead_paragraph: The commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration, Dr. Margaret A. Hamburg, discusses its proposed rule that would cover e-cigarettes.

headline.main: Regulating E-Cigarettes: The View From the F.D.A.
headline.print_headline: Regulating E-Cigarettes: The View From the F.D.A.
